node.title: Being Willing to Fully Invest in All of Our Patients
node.description:
A presentation meant to: 1. Equip dentists in the treatment of patients with autism through behavior guidance and non-invasive procedures.

2. Motivate doctors to have the faith to incorporate an "eternal perspective" in their practice through personal mission stories from our family's time in Peru.

 

Objectives:

Demonstrate new treatment modalities for patients with autism and how they can impact your practice

Discuss ideal methods for evaluation of business success

Illustrate how to incorporate sustainable, long-term missions and charitable giving into your practice
